Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Increase approvers to 2 for deployment." (#1706) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This is to tighten security for nuget deployment.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "[Performance] Reduce ElementFeatureCollection calls" (#1704) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: **Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.** This is only a performance report of something I noticed during profiling. **Describe the solution you'd like** A recent profiling session of a simple XML file with ~100_000 lines (by ~10 columns) showed that https://github.com/dotnet/Open-XML-SDK/blob/55f916df3dce862c71a16c59dd579b8d0d5fc152/src/DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Framework/Features/FeatureExtensions.cs#L19 takes ~25% of the time of the actual WriteTo calls. I expect that the time is simply that much as it is called for each cell multiple times, each individual call is likely very short, but it simply adds up. **Describe alternatives you've considered** n/a **Additional context** n/a

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Remove NuGet.Packaging.Core, as it's an assembly that only contains forwarders" (#1703) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Remove NuGet.Packaging.Core since it only contains type forwarders.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed pull request "Bump danielpalme/ReportGenerator-GitHub-Action from 5.2.2 to 5.2.4" (#1699) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Bumps [danielpalme/ReportGenerator-GitHub-Action](https://github.com/danielpalme/reportgenerator-github-action) from 5.2.2 to 5.2.4.
Release notes

Sourced from danielpalme/ReportGenerator-GitHub-Action's releases.

5.2.4

-#630 Added "raw mode" (settings:rawMode=true) to disable that coverage data of nested or compiler generated classes is included in the parent class. This is useful to merge several Cobertura files into a single file.

5.2.3

  • #656 Changed handling of files which are not found in source directory

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Bump danielpalme/ReportGenerator-GitHub-Action from 5.2.2 to 5.2.5" (#1705) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Bumps [danielpalme/ReportGenerator-GitHub-Action](https://github.com/danielpalme/reportgenerator-github-action) from 5.2.2 to 5.2.5.
Release notes

Sourced from danielpalme/ReportGenerator-GitHub-Action's releases.

5.2.5

Changes:

  • #665 Improved handling of duplicate classes in JaCoCo files

This release requires .NET Framework 4.7 or .NET 6.0/7.0/8.0

5.2.4

-#630 Added "raw mode" (settings:rawMode=true) to disable that coverage data of nested or compiler generated classes is included in the parent class. This is useful to merge several Cobertura files into a single file.

5.2.3

  • #656 Changed handling of files which are not found in source directory
